body: People         This is one interpretation of the Roosevelt family coat of arms that is on display at Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace NHS. NPS  Learn more about the Roosevelt family by clicking on the links below: The Roosevelt Family Tree and Coat of Arms Martha Bulloch Roosevelt Theodore Roosevelt, Sr. Anna Roosevelt Elliott Roosevelt Corinne Roosevelt      Â      An artist's rendition of East 20th Street between Park Avenue South and Broadway in New York City, circa 1865. It is the location of the Roosevelt family brownstone townhouse where Theodore was born on October 27, 1858. title: Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace National Historic Site: People
